text:
Treatment Options by Stage
		            
		                
		                    Stage I Nasopharyngeal Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage I nasopharyngeal cancer is usually radiation therapy to the tumor and lymph nodes in the neck.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage I nasopharyngeal cancer.
